title: Button Finds Family and Friends at the Farm
description: When Button visits a farm, he wants Farmer Chris to take him up the hill to a cute little red hen house for their first stop. A rooster pecks his toe and he rolls down the hill, crushing watermelons along the way. Unhurt, he finds a big surprise at the bottom of the hill near Samâ€™s Sheep Farm. What is the surprise? Share the love of reading with your beginner reader!
author: Joyce  Mitchell
